member.name: T:Coypu.Configuration
member.summary: Global configuration settings

member.name: M:Coypu.Configuration.Reset
member.summary: Reset all configuration settings to their default values

summary.para: When retrying, how long to wait for elements to appear or actions to complete without error.
Default: 10sec
How long to wait between retries
Default: 100ms
Specifies the browser you would like to control
Default: Firefox
Specifies the driver you would like to use to control the browser
Default: SeleniumWebDriver
How long to wait between finding an element and clicking it.
Default: zero
The host of the website you are testing, e.g. 'github.com'
Default: localhost
The port of the website you are testing
Default: 80
Whether to use the HTTPS protocol to connect to website you are testing
Default: false

summary.para: Execute an action repeatedly until a condition is met.
